about_the_game: This Demo will let you play the first stage of my up-coming action RPG "Monstronium".
detailed_description: This Demo will let you play the first stage of my up-coming action RPG "Monstronium".
name: Monstronium Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 & Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 7th Gen, AMD Zen2/Zen3 4 Core
  • Graphics: Intel UHD 630 iGPU
  • Additional Notes: Xbox compatible game controller for best experience.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 & Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 1165G7
  • Graphics: GTX 1060m

short_description: Demo of my up-coming action RPG "Monstronium".
